titleStmt.title: Coll. Sidney's lamentation and last farewel to the world. Being condemn'd for high-treason, in conspiring the death of his sacred Majesty, and royal brother

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Dean, in Cranborn-street, in Leicester-Fields, over-against Newport-House,
